abstract: Banco Santander reported a nine-month net profit of $7.4 billion that was below expectations, and the bank said it had focused on continuing to diversify away from its Spanish operations.
snippet: Banco Santander reported a nine-month net profit of $7.4 billion that was below expectations, and the bank said it had focused on continuing to diversify away from its Spanish operations.

headline.main: Santander's Profit Fell 13% in First 9 Months of 2011
